import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import Swal from 'sweetalert2' const ProductsManager = ({ products, onRemove, categories }) => { let { id } = useParams(); const category = categories.find(category => category.id === id); const removeHandle = (id) => { Swal.fire({ title: 'Bạn có chắc chắn muốn xóa?', text: "You won't be able to revert this!", icon: 'warning', showCancelButton: true, confirmButtonColor: '#3085d6', cancelButtonColor: '#d33', confirmButtonText: 'Yes, delete it!' }).then((result) => { if (result.value) { onRemove(id) Swal.fire( 'Deleted!', 'Your file has been deleted.', 'success' ) } }) console.log(id) } return (
{products.map(({ id, name, image, price }, index) => ( ))}
# Name Image Price Action
{index + 1} {name} {price} Sửa
) } ProductsManager.propTypes = { } export default ProductsManager
